Rules.InvariantScript:
" Job Number: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.Title & "
Project Category: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Project Category'.Value & "
Service Required: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Service Required' & "
Response ID: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.ResponseID & "
Task Date: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Task Date' & "
Task Time: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Start Time' & "
Task Location: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Task Location' & "
Task Deadline: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.Deadline & "
Tail Number: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Tail Number' & "
Working Hazards: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.Hazards & "
" & "
Customer Name: " & Concatenate(cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.Rank, " ", cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Customer Name') & "
Customer Section: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Customer Section' & "
Customer Email: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Customer Email' & "
Customer Contact Number: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Customer Contact Number' & "
Alternate Contact: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'POC if Different' & "
" & "
Task Requirements: " & cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Task Requirements'

If(
    cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Approval Status' = "Awaiting Approval", Color.Orange,
    cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Approval Status' = "Approved", Color.Green,
    cmp_ApprovalsPopup.SelectedJob.'Approval Status' = "Rejected", Color.Red,
    
    Color.Gray)
